title: Hibachi Supreme includes 8 oz Chateaubriand and lobster tail
statement: The Hibachi Supreme features an 8 oz center cut Chateaubriand tenderloin served with a grilled cold water lobster tail brushed with lobster butter.

citations.quote: An 8 oz center cut Chateaubriand tenderloin is served with a grilled cold water lobster tail brushed with indulgent lobster butter
